summary: An ordinance fixing the rate of taxes to be levied and levying the taxes upon the taxable property in the City of Seattle, both real and personal needed to raise sufficient revenue to meet the expenses of the different departments of the City of Seattle for the ensuing fiscal year, to-wit, for the year beginning on the 1st day of January 1912 and ending on the 31st day of December, 1912, including the interest to accrue during said year on the bond deeded and the payment of bonds falling due during said year.
